Blog.post: From a conversation i had with Dave about my dream last night: we were driving in the Geo got cut off by a cop car and fire truck all kinds of stuff, they yelled at us to just stay still and not move i jumped in the back seat, then I saw a guy on top of Allens but it was like a fun house, so I got in the back seat or something we were all freaked out just sittin there and then the guy on top of the building actually had a sniper rifle, I was looking at the back of your head and then I just saw a spray of blood and you moaned then slumped over and all this blood just leaked out of your head all over the place and I was freaking out and then I woke up. I don't dream very much but when I do it is usually very disturbing, I actually had another dream last night as well but I pretty much just got shot in the back twice and it hurt really bad when I woke up.

I saw One Cent Stamp last night it was enjoyable because the back-up guitarist used my amp, i'm getting a Seymour Duncan Sh-10 Full Shred Humbucker pickup for my guitar, it will be about $80 and One Cent Stamps guitarist is going to install it for me and teach me how to do it for future reference, it will be very enjoyable and my guitar will even more stimulating, Hi Allison.

Me and my friend Dave went to an old abandoned Polygamists house a while ago it was creepy. It's just up on this hill in the middle of nowhere out in Mapleton, I have no idea why it's empty doesn't make any sense. It was obviously built in the 1970's but whatever. After that we went and got Ben and just watched the lightning and stuff Lightning is way cool I love it. Today I got hired at Teleperformance USA in Orem. I'll be a Telemarketer, but i'll get $7.75 an hour that is very enjoyable I will be filthy rich. I recommend these web pages urlLink justiceforkurt.com , urlLink www.audioslave.com , urlLink www.aperfectcircle.com , urlLink www.primussucks.com , urlLink www.toolband.com

I just got back from seeing Napaleon Dynamite that movie is hilarious. For my brothers work they had a special sneek preview screening because the owner is the film makers brother it was hilarious, like the funnist movie i've seen in a long time

I'm really bored so Imade this stupid thing. Hahaha I went to Seven Peaks today and it was enjoyable. I love my guitars and my amp they are so good to me. If people actually read this then that is really sad.
urlLink I love You Kurt urlLink
I saw Incubus last night it was surprisingly enjoyable. I got my pickup installed and working today my guitar is gorgeous in sound and body.

So I order a pickup online right, they send it to me, happens to be the wrong one, so i get them to send another one I get it tonight and it's the wrond one again, well isn't that just great this company is retarder samedaymusic they are idiots.

urlLink I am working at Telemarketing so I can save up enough money to get one of these cars this car is sweet. It's going to cost around $10,000 I should be able to pick one up at the end of next summer oh man they are awesome. urlLink
